title: Logistics Coordinator
description: Coordinate and optimize supply chain operations, including transportation and warehousing.

title: Supply Chain Manager
description: Oversee end-to-end supply chain processes and vendor relationships.

title: Warehouse Supervisor
description: Manage warehouse staff, inventory control, and shipping/receiving operations.

title: Procurement Officer
description: Source and negotiate with suppliers to ensure cost-effective procurement.

title: Distribution Manager
description: Plan and execute product distribution strategies across regions.

title: Fleet Manager
description: Maintain and optimize company vehicle fleet operations and compliance.
